name: "Buckets" Nelson
effect: Shootout: Discard a card from your hand to create one shark in Nelson's posse if this Shootout is taking place at an out-of-town location. The shark is a dude with a one-Bullet Stud rating. The shark is removed from play after the Shootout is over. Nelson can perform this action any number of times per turn.

name: Barkum & Barkum Attorneys
effect: Private. Controller Noon Pull: Boot the attorneys and one of your Wanted dudes. If the pull's value is less than or equal to the dude's value, the dude is no longer Wanted.

name: Basil Whateley
effect: Huckster:2 Noon Pull: Boot Basil and target one dude in play. If the pull plus Basil's Huckster skill are greater than the dude's value, the dude is booted.

name: Billy No-Neck
effect: May not have any weapons.

name: Blood Curse
effect: Noon Hex 8: If this Hex is successful, one dude in play has a -1 Bullet and -1 Influence penalty until after nightfall. Shootout Hex 9: If this Hex is successful, one dude in this shootout has a -2 Bullet penalty until nightfall.

name: Bronco Bjork Gutmansen
effect: Horses being attached to Bjork have their cost reduced by four. Bronco Bjork will not trade away a horse he has attached.

name: Byron St. James
effect: You cannot move St. James to any location that contains Howard Findley. (This does not affect bringing St. James into play.)

name: Callahan's Ditch
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Circus Sideshow
effect: Charlie Landers goes to his controller's discard pile if he is in play. Until nightfall, all Draw Hands are drawn from the opposing Player's deck. Cards from Draw Hands are discarded into their owner's discard pile.

name: Deputize
effect: Noon: All of your dudes that are not currently in your Outfit become members of your Outfit.

name: Dolores Whateley
effect: Huckster:0 Noon: Boot Dolores to give a -1 Bullet penalty to any dude until nightfall. Noon: Discard a black card to give Dolores a +2 Bullet bonus and to raise her Huckster rank by two until nightfall.

name: Eagle Rock
effect: Will not call out a Sioux.

name: Foreclosure
effect: Cheatin'! Reaction: Play when another Player reveals an illegal Draw Hand. Select one deed owned by that player which is discarded. Only one Cheatin'! card can be played against a Player per draw.

name: Forgery
effect: Noon: Play a deed out of your hand that matches a deed in play. The deed in play is aced and your deed enters play normally. All dudes that were at the deed are moved to yours, without booting.

name: Greased Lightning Pill
effect: Gadget Difficulty:4 Shootout: Ace the Pill to give this dude +3 Bullets until the end of this shootout.

name: Helpin' Hand
effect: Reaction Hex X: Boot this Huckster when a dude is aced. The difficulty of this Hex is equal to the Dude's value plus Influence plus bullets. If the Hex is successful, the Dude is not aced, but is moved home booted.

name: His Back Was to Me
effect: Shootout: Reduce the Bullet Rating of one opposing dude to be equal to the highest bullet Rating in your posse. If you donot have any Studs in your posse, the target becomes a Draw bonus fighter as well. The reduction is only for this round of the Shootout.

name: Independence Day
effect: All government buildings are booted except for Jail and give no bonuses or production this turn. Boot Lucky Ted(s). Ace this card.

name: It's Just Coal…
effect: Noon: Target one player, who loses 2 ghost rock. Ace this card.

name: King Willy's Mother Lode
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Lord Grimely's Manor
effect: Private. Raise the Fear Level by one while the Manor is in play. Players other than the Manor's owner may not gain control of the Manor or Deeds adjacent to the Manor. While the Fear Level is 10, you have one additional Control Point.

name: Manitou's Revenge
effect: Reaction: Play when a spell fails. Pull: if the value is lower than the spell's difficulty, the dude performing the spell is aced.

name: Mind Twist
effect: Noon Hex X: Boot this Huckster. The difficulty of this Hex is three times the target's Influence. If the Hex is successful, the target in play has his or her Influence reduced by two (minimum zero) until after nightfall.

name: Missed Me!
effect: Shootout Hex 5: If this Hex is successful, then one is subtracted from the number of Dudes in your posse that must be aced in this round of the combat.

name: Missing Children
effect: All Whateleys in play with the Huckster skill have a +1 Bullet Rating this turn.

name: Moses Whateley-Braun
effect: Non-Unique. Huckster:0

name: Nicodemus Whateley
effect: Huckster:2 Noon: Boot Nicodemus when he is in the same location as an Abomination. You control the Abomination until after nightfall.

name: Nowhere to Run
effect: Reaction: Play when a posse is trying to escape a Shootout. They are stuck in the Shootout and must fight another round.

name: Pacific Maze Railstation
effect: Public. Railstation produces 1 ghost rock per Maze Rat in play. Controller Reaction: Boot Railstation to raise or lower the cost of any goods being purchased by 2 ghost rock.

name: Pierre Fontaine
effect: Mad Scientist:2 Noon: Move Pierre from one out-of-town deed to another. This does not boot Pierre.

name: Sam Horowitz
effect: Cards with "Dynamite" or "Bomb" in their title have no ghost rock cost when being attached to Horowitz. Noon: Boot Horowitz. The deed Horowitz is in produces no ghost rock until after nightfall next turn, and Horowitz cannot perform any actions until after nightfall this turn.

name: Samhain
effect: Harrowed dudes aced this turn are returned to play immediately to the controller's home, booted (no pull necessary). All Terrors gain +1 Bullet bonus for this turn. Raise the Fear Level by one. Ace this card.

name: Saul Whateley
effect: Huckster:0 Reaction: Boot Saul as the target for a Hex is being selected to redirect the Hex to any other legal target.

name: Shadow Walk
effect: Noon Hex 4: If this Hex is successful, move this Huckster to any location in play. Reaction Hex 6: If this Hex is successful when a posse is being formed or moved, then this Huckster joins the posse, regardless of location.

name: Sheila Mirabella
effect: You can attach goods to Sheila while she is at a strike you do not control. Noon: Boot Sheila and pay 2 ghost rock while she is at an out-of-town location to get any one goods card from your deck. Show the card to the other players and attach it to Sheila. You must meet all normal restrictions and costs.

name: Sheriff's Watchin'
effect: Reaction: Play immediately before one or more dudes begin to perform an action that would make them Wanted. The action is canceled without effect.

name: Shotgun
effect: Weapon. Shootout: Ace any opposing dude whose value is equal to or lower than this dude's Bullet Rating.

name: Smith & Robards Delivery
effect: Noon: You may put one gadget into play as a Noon action this turn. You must still pay the cost of the gadget and test to make sure it works (as if a Mad Scientist:1 were bringing the gadget into play). This gadget can be attached to any dude that may legally accept it.

name: Soul Blast
effect: Shootout Hex X: The difficulty of this Hex is an opposing Dude's value plus bullets. If this Hex is successful, the target is booted and sent home. If the Hex is successful by more than 5 points, the target is aced as well. If you pull an ace or Joker, the Huckster is also aced.

name: Stray Lead
effect: Reaction: Play immediately after hands have been revealed in a Shootout when a player has won by more ranks than the losing posse has dudes. The player winning this Shootout has killed an innocent person- until the end of the game, he or she is always considered to have one fewer control points than he or she actually does.

name: Sunnyside Hotel
effect: Public. Brothel.

name: Texas Twister
effect: Noon Hex 5: If this Hex is successful, boot one Dude at an adjacent location. Noon Hex X: If this Hex is successful, boot any one Dude in play. The difficulty of the Hex is the target's value plus Influence.

name: The Clock Tower
effect: Public. The controller of the Clock Tower gets one Shootout action before The Winner during any Shootout.

name: The Witching Hour
effect: Noon: Boot more of your Hucksters than the current Fear Level to raise the Fear Level by one. Ace this card.

name: They Just Pay Better 'N You
effect: Noon: Play a dude out of your hand that matches a non-unique dude in play (but not in Boot Hill). Your dude enters play (ghost rock costs are waived), and the opposing dude is discarded with any goods he may have. Any permanent effects carry over to your dude.

name: Unknown Hooded Figure
effect: Abomination. You must have a member of the Whateley Outfit in play to bring the Figure into play. The Figure can start the game in play. Reaction: The first time it is aced in a game, return the Figure home Harrowed as your first action next High Noon, and give it a permanent +1 Bullet bonus.

name: Werewolf
effect: Non-Unique. Abomination. You may not bring the Werewolf into play through normal means (starting with it or paying to play it from your hand as a Noon action). Goods cannot be attached to the Werewolf. Noon Pull: Boot the Werewolf. If the pull is Black, put a Lycanthrope dude into play from your Hand in the Werewolf's location. Put the Werewolf into your hand, discarding attached goods. You may only perform this action if the Fear Level is below 8.

name: Werner Braun
effect: Proprietor of the 1st Bank of Gomorra

name: Whateley Family Estate
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:17 Noon: Boot one of your Hucksters who is at a location where a dude was aced this turn. Your dude's Huckster skill is permanently increased by one.

name: Wilhelmina Whateley
effect: Huckster:3 If Wilhelmina ever dies, Whateley dudes in play can not take any actions this turn. Wilhelmina cannot move out of town. Noon: Boot Wilhelmina and pay ghost rock to produce combat bonuses. Each ghost rock paid gives a +1 Bullet bonus to a dude you control until after nightfall. No dude can receive more than a +2 Bullet bonus.

name: Yer Cheatin' Too!
effect: Reaction: Play when another player plays a Cheatin'! card targeting you and they also have an illegal hand for this draw. Your opponent's Cheatin'! card is canceled and has no effects.
